title: Elementary Professional Social Education Operation Scenarios Through Online TBL (Team-Based Learning) Sessions

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Learners preparing for professional careers in medical/legal/technical fields who require social situation analysis and collaborative competency enhancement in simulation/VR environments

learning_goals: Learners can propose at least three complex social problem-solving strategies through real-time collaboration with team members in online TBL sessions.
Learners can analyze provided social scenarios in simulation/VR environments and derive team-agreed conclusions.
Learners can perform TBL’s four stages (individual learning → team learning → peer assessment → instructor feedback) online and write reports meeting evaluation criteria.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
